nodes.text: Person X has issues with his/her colleagues
Person X stays longer in his/her office
Person X's managers are informed that he had a job interview at a competitor company

If someone has issues with his/her colleagues and stays longer in his/her office and there is evidence that he had a job interview at a competitor company, then he/she is committing corporate espionage
Person X is committing corporate espionage

nodes.scheme: Issues with colleagues, interview - corporate espionage
CQ: Is this evidence enough to prove corporate espionage?
